documents.document:
Sushi Dinner (03/10/07)

2day 1 of my colleagues, all of a sudden, suggested that we go shopping @ a new shopping ctr in the east. AND, WELL, WE DID. 2gether with 3 other of my colleagues we went shopping right after work till 7pm plus than we went to hv our dinner @ a sushi rest. We had 3 binto sets, 8 plates of sushi, 3 chawamushis & 2 tampura ice creams. IT'S THE 1ST TIME THAT ANY OF US HAD SOOOOO FULL! We were SO full that we don't even feel like standing up let alone walk out of the rest, than out of the S C, than take a train home. But we had no choice. We had to go home & slp, right?

We were there till about 9pm b4 we realised that it was very late AND WE ALL NEED TO GET UP 4 WORK THE VERY NEXT MORNING! So we quickly went home 2 slp.

Curry Chicken (07/10/07)

1 of the Aunties @ our mkt told me & some other aunties that she'll b cooking curry chicken yesterday. I was sooooo happy when I heard that she's cooking curry chicken cos her curry chicken iz really very very very gd! (^_^) Hmmmmm . . . Very lemak very hot . . .

What's left after only a short time is => an empty BIG bowl! Which was very very very full less than 3 hrs ago!

Although I was a little late, I still get to eat 1 small full bowl of curry which almost overflow & almost 1/2 a loaf of baguette (jam tao lo ti).

CPF-BS (12/10/2007)

2day I went to CPF-(BS Br) with my mum.

Re : I'm helping my mum to register for the Workfare Income Supplement Scheme (WIS). It's said that we're to register b4 we pay can make any payment @ any AXS machines islandwide. But as my mum had already registered for any other scheme previously, I thought we could skip this step. So we made a payment @ an AXS machine near our hse. It was only later that CPF sent back a chq that we know that we HAD to register 1st. Hai . . . So my mum & I went to the nearest CPF to register.

Shopping @ sq2 (13/10/2007)

2day I went shopping with my bro & my cousins. i promissed to bring them out AFTER their exams. So as their Older cousin, I had to keep my promissed, right?

We went shopping in a quite new shopping ctr for the entire afternoon. But b4 we went shopping, we had our lunch 1st in a cafe. Than we went shopping. We bought quite a no. of things & had a great time @ the game arcade. I bought a soft toy @ the shopping ctr & won 2 soft toyz @ the arcade. We even went 4 a mango desert b4 we went home separetely.

Annual Pray @ Temple (14/10/2007)

2day I went to a temple for praying. Every yr, rain or shine, my family & I would go to thiz temple for praying. There were a lot of ppl there when we reached there. So many ppl, so smokey. After praying, my family & I went to hv some vegetarian Bee Hoon, veg curry & drinks provided by the temple, sponsored by many kind ppl & companies. After having our breakfast there, we left the temple to take a bus back home. There is a lamp w/ a dragon on it. I saw it on our way out. We stop by the hypermkt, in the shopping ctr near my hse, to do some grocery shopping. Than we happily carried many bags of grocery home.

Malay Wedding Buffet @ CCK (21/10/2007)

I went 2 a wedding lunch buffet in CCK 2day w/ my parents. It's my mum's side's relative's son's wedding. It's a malay style wedding as there r 2 long tables of food 4 u 2 take your food fr. But the food on the 2 tables r the same. Than after putting the food on your plate, u can go & find a table w/ chairs to sit down & enjoy your food. As we had to rush back in time to cook dinner 4 my bro, we left early (b4 the bride & bridegroom is here). It's a pity thought as normally malay brides r very beautiful. This is due to the assories on their head & the traditional dress the bride's wearing. It's just very very beautiful. B4 we left the place, we were given a 'thank you gift'. It's a traditional in malay weddings to your guests a thank you gift when they arrive or b4 they leave the place.

CEPP Training by SCDF (27/10/2007)

2day is a very very very important day 4 me. Cos 2day is the day where by I'm going 4 my Community Emergency Preparedness Programme (CEPP). After a day of learning how to deal w/ some simple emergencies, I really feel very tire. But I felt that, althought it's a very tiring day (w/ tones of things to remember), I HAD LEARNT A LOT. We've learnt how to do the CORRECT WAY to perform CPR & chest compression on ppl, how to do some simple bandaging, how to put out SMALL fires & what to do during an emergency @ HOME.

In a nutshell, it was a very fruitful day.

D.I.Y Stationary Holder

Do u know that we can SAVE $ by making our own stationary holder?

YES WE CAN! (^_^)

u'll need :
1.) Wrapping paper / magazine pages,
2.) Toilet paper rolls (small or big doesn't matter),
3.) Glue,
4.) Cardboard,
5.) Scissors or pen knife,

What to do :
1.) Cut cardboard into round shape (using the toilet paper roll to draw),
2.) Glue the cardboard to the toilet paper roll,
3.) Cut the wrapping paper / mag pages into the size & shape needed,
4.) Glue the wrapping paper / mag pages to the toilet paper roll (covering ALL sides including the inner side & bottom part),

* Optional : u can paste a round shape wrapping paper / mag page to the bottom of the holder (if u want).

(U can go 2 my pix album 2 c 1 of stationary holder I've made-it's the 1 b4 the dragon lamp)

New Year, New Begining

After stop writing for so long, I've decided to start all over again. Let's just start with 1st Jan 2009.

01.01.2009
Went to dye hair
This sun I’ve to attend a wedding lunch @ Liang Court with my family. So I went to cut & dye my hair. This will cut short my time @ the salon on Sun & I wouldn’t hv to rush like hell that morning.

03.01.2009
Yong Tai's wedding @ Novotel (Near Liang Court)
Today’s a BIG day for my cousin. IT’S HIS WEDDING DAY! My family & I went to the hotel early today bcos there’s a tea ceremony going on b4 the lunch begins. My grand mum was so happy that she just couldn’t keep her lips closed. She’s just simply too happy to close them. That’s what she did when the groom’s big bro got married too.

Singapore River Hong Bao 2009

24.01.2009
River Hong Bao opening
There were 2 buses fr YCKCC. It’s not the 1st time I’m going to the River Hong Bao BUT it’s the 1st time I’m going to the opening. That’s y I’m very excited. There were many big & lovely lanterns. And not forgetting the fireworks & creakers were there too. The performance was great. I only know I’ve taken tones of photos. But what I didn’t know is I’ve taken more than 200 photos @ the end of the day. OMG! That’s a lot photo in just a few hrs only! However, I’ve yet to see the pixs taken by the CC’s cameraman. Hmmm . . . I wander how’s his photos? I’m sure his is much more beautiful than my. Cos his cam is a very gd one.

CNY 2009

26.01.2009 & 27.01.2009
CNY Day 1 & Day 2
Today’s the day again. IT’S CNY! Yeah! Yippee!

Day 1
As usual, I woke up early in the morning to help my mum prepare the 1st breakfast of the lunar year. After that we’ll wait . . . . . . wait for my cousins to come. Than IT’S RESTING TIME! Yes I love it. I rested till early evening b4 I start preparing dinner with my mum. As usual, my uncle & his family are coming for dinner. His children just simply loved to come to our house. Re : They can eat, play & pack home if they can’t stuff in but still wish to eat some more.

Day 2
As usual, my family & I went to one of my aunt’s house. Stayed there for a hr plus b4 setting off to one of my uncle’s house in Jr where we stayed for a hr plus. Next, we went off to my favorite place : my uncle’s house in Bt Panjang! We stayed there the longest. Cos we always stayed to hv dinner. This yr, my cousin decided to cook spaghetti for us to eat. Hai . . . I’ve finally get a chance to taste her cooking. After having dinner, both families set off to our last stop : another one of my aunt’s house. Where we stayed for an hr plus b4 we head back home for a gd night’s rest. Cos we still got to get up early the next morning to get to work.

Yeah I know. The ‘as usual’ thing looks so boring. Nothing unusual, nothing special. It’s not happening. But it’s OK. Cos being together is the MOST impt thing. And I enjoyed the feeling of being together.

31.01.2009
CNY Dinner @ Blk 624
Tonight I’ve to attend a CNY dinner with my mum organised by one of the RCs near my hse. The food was ok loh. The performance was nothing as it’s just some ppl singing karaoke only. And of course some lion dance. But anyway, I did had my own fun though. I did have fun chatting with the aunties and drinking some red wine they’ve bought by themselves. So on the whole, it’s ok lah. Most impt thing is I did enjoy myself. And I think my mum enjoyed herself too.

01.02.2009
ChingGey @ YCKCC
Tonight the floats fr ChingGey are finally coming near to my hse! Yippee! They look so tall, so beautiful! IT’S A PITY I 4GOT TO BRING MY CAMERA DOWN TO TAKE PHOTOS! OH MAN! Y AM I SO 4GETFUL?! Ahhh . . . Grrr . . . I so hate myself for that.

07.02.2009
CNY Dinner @ YCKCC
Tonight I’ve to attend a CNY dinner with my mum organised by YCKCC. The food tasted better than the RC’s CNY dinner. Although the rest. was the same one. The food just tasted better. I don’t know y but it is so. I guess the environment did play a part too. Cos the CC’s dinner is in the hall where there’s air-con. The performance was the same. Just some ppl singing karaoke on stage. But the diff is that there’s a space for ppl to dance (if u like). And of course some lion dance too. But anyway, I did had my own fun. I did have fun chatting with the aunties and drinking some red wine they’ve bought by themselves. So on the whole, it’s ok also. Most impt thing is I did enjoy myself. And I think my mum enjoyed herself too.

@ JN's Hse

08.02.2009
Went to JN's house
Today I’ve arranged to meet SI @ JN’s hse. I told them that I’m cooking spaghetti for them to eat. So I went to NTUC to buy the ingredients b4 setting off to JN’s hse. After reaching JN’s hse, I start off by cooking the spaghetti 1st. After cooking the spaghetti, I stored them in a pot & put it into the fridge to chill. Than I went to prepare the ingredients needed for the sauces. JN wasn’t free either. She was preparing pizza for us to eat. After eating the spaghetti that I’ve cooked & the pizza that JN had cooked, all 3 of us sat down no not sat down it’s laid down on the sofa in the living rm, watching TV.

Yun's Mum's Hse

09.02.2009
Went to Yun’s house
OMG! What a chaotic afternoon! I had some miscommunication with my friend CY over the HP. I was waiting for CY @ AMK while CY was waiting for me @ Sengkang. We didn’t realized it @ 1st. Cos both places hv MRT, hv Body shop, hv bus interchange with bus no.86. It was only when CY said ‘Metro’ that I known we’re @ different places. Cos AMK got no Metro. So in the end we arranged to meet @ another MRT station. We originally planed to reach Boon Keng b4 12.00pm but in the end we reached @ about 1.30pm. So we decided to hv our lunch 1st. @ 1st I wanted to bring CY to eat chicken rice but unfortunately we were unable to find it. So we decided to hv our lunch @ Mac instead. Than we took a cab to our friend’s mum’s hse. We stayed there for about 2 hrs chatting & playing with her son. Than I brought CY to two arcades where I spent about $60 altogether & CY spent about $70. We both brought home 2 bags of sweets & 2 soft toys (a pig & an elephant).

Sq2 again

15.02.2009
Went Square2 Again with family
Today I went shopping with my family @ sq2. We had our lunch, did a little shopping. Than went back home for dinner.

Blood Donation

08.03.2009
Donate blood @ YCKCC
There’s a blood donation drive @ YCKCC. After registering, I went to have a basic check-up by the doc & nurses. Than I went to the donation bed to donate my blood. After the blood donation, I was bandaged. And the little squeeze toy that I was given to help the flow of blood & some pills to help replace the iron lost in the donation were given to me as a thank you gift. Than I went to the refreshment corner to hv some of the drinks & biscuits provided. Cos after donating blood, the donor’s BP will tend to drop a little. That’s y if u 1 2 donate blood, your BP hv to be a bit higher. After the donation, a rest & some refreshment is needed. This will help push up the donor’s BP. At the end of the day the CC managed to help collect 105 bags of blood for the National Blood Bank of Singapore. That could help save quite a no. of lives u know.

Singapore Flyer

14.03.2009
Went Singapore Flyer with JN & SI
OMG, what a tiring day today. I've arranged to meet SI & JN @ Clarke Quay MRT @ 12.30pm. Than we'll take a free boat ride to Singapore Flyer to hv our long waiting ride. But when we reached the pier, we discovered that there are no more free rides! We hv to pay if we still want to take the boat ride to the flyer. It's $5 (to & fro) & $9 (to only). In the end we decided to hv our lunch taken @ The Central's foodcourt. Than we take the MRT to Raffles MRT for the free bus svc to the flyer provided by Singapore Flyer. So in the end, we were @ the flyer @ about 2pm. B4 we got into the cabin, we took a photo @ L2. After the ride, SI & I took the photos @ $30 for 2 pcs (night view & day view of us in the flyer cabin). After the ride, SI, JN, my brother & I went to hv a cup of coffee b4 we take our dinner @ Raffles Shopping Ctr. Well that's a day gone. Oh yes, I bought a bottle of red wine for $29 @ the SC with some free gifts.

Qing Ming

21.03.2009 & 22.03.2009
Went pray for Qing Ming
Tomorrow (22/03/09) morning we’re going to pay our respects to my grandfathers & grandmothers. Today (21/03/09), I went to the market to buy most of the things we need for the praying. This way tomorrow morning we wouldn’t hv to rush like hell & panic. The next day, as per planned, my family & I got up real early. Went to the market to hv our breakfast, took & bought all the things we needed for the praying. Than we set off to Guang Ming Shan, to pray for my grandparents (my father’s side), where we’ve arranged to meet with my aunt. Than we lay out all the offerings & things for praying. My father, my cousin & me went to ‘invite’ & ‘bring’ our grandparents to the offering table to ‘enjoy’ the offerings. During the invitation, we feel that my grandfather’s urn look very dirty. There was this uncle who was in the columbium. So we’ve decided to ask him to help clean the urn. In rtn, we’ve given him a small amt of money in a red packet. After leaving Guang Ming Shan, we left for Tong Teck Shan Tong where we’d be praying my grandfather (my mother’s side). Than we left the place for home. Finally, after a tiring day, I can go home & rest.
However, during normal days @ home, I do missed my grandfather (my father’s father) sometimes. I’d think of the times he’d fetch me to & fro fr school starting fr PAP to pri school. He’d bring me to the market every morning to drink soya milk. He loved me so much and I missed him so much. But I never had a chance to say ‘AH GONG I LOVE U’ & top up with a kiss on the chick.

Marina Barrage & FRH

29.03.2009
1.) Walk @ Marina Barrage
OMG! So tired! Today I'm going to the new Marina Barrage with my family. I woke up @ 6am today, had a little breakfast, than went to YCKCC. We waited till 8am (sh b 7.30am) b4 we set off to Marina Barrage. After arriving @ the barrage, we were given a bottle of drink & a bun. Than we went to the open area near the visitor's center for our mthly exercise. Than we went for a round about tour on the open field of the barrage. We left the barrage @ about 10.15am. Reached YCKCC @ about 10.45am. We rested for a while @ the CC b4 we took a bus to AMKHub. We were there for about 3 or 4 hrs spending about $50 plus in all. Bcos we spent over $50, we were entitled to get a free gift & a chance in the lucky draw. The free gift I choose is the 'Art & Craft session'. It turned out to be a rubber craft that you'd add colours to a pix outline. In this case it's a clown with a big thinking balloon. Than we went home for a gd rest.

2.) FRH in Singapore (IMM Garden Plaza & St James PowerHouse) -> didn't go
Arrived in S'pore @ 11.35am @ Singapore Changi Airport in flight MI 333. Arrived in IMM Garden Plaza for autograph session for 3rd album <Yue lai Yue Ai> / <Loving More And More> Singapore version 1 & 2 only fr 3pm. Arrived @ St James PowerHouse for pte party fr 7.30pm.

Praying for Qing Ming @ home

04.04.2009
Praying for Qing Ming @ Home
Today I woke up early again. Cos I need to go to the mkt to get the things needed for the praying later @ home. My mother & I 1st went to buy a duck, some roasted pork, a pkt of yellow dao kua, a fish cake & some veg. Than we went to catch out breakfast. After that, it’s bz time. We went home to make a pot of tea, a pot of soup & laid the table for praying. After praying, we had our lunch. Took a short rest. Than went to YCKCC for our next activity.

SCDF Open Hse

04.04.2009
Went to SCDF’s CD shelter open House @ Lorong Chuan
What a fruitful trip! I’ve learnt so much today. What to do in a CD shelter. I’ve always heard of ppl saying what to do what to do in a CD shelter. But I’ve never been to a CD shelter b4. So I can’t really imagine that. However, now that I’ve been to CD shelter, I know what I should do in a CD shelter. 1st of all we must try to STAY CALM. 2ND, move to a public CD SHELTER (if u do not hv 1 @ home). 3rd, FOLLOW INSTRUCTIONS when u r in the shelter. Only come out of the shelter when it’s safe. Not only that, I’ve also learnt what the SCDF personnels will do sh there b a chemical attack, what r the facilities in the CD shelter & etc. in a nutshell, I’ve learnt tones today. READINESS IS YOUR ONLY PROTECTION
